texts.name: Werser
texts.biography: Werser had excellent hearing, so great infact that he could hear the frequency on which seahorses speak. Werser thus developed a talent for speaking with the beasts.

specialty.description:
{Seahorses and Magic Seahorse}

Increases Speed of any Seahorses or Magic Seahorse by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Seahorses
